Evocation 4

Fate of Oedipus

F4
spell id [id]: 529

Fate of Oedipus:Fate of Oedipus
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster punishes a mage for having claimed the Eyes of God. The mage's eyes are blasted by brilliance, his eye sockets emptied forever, and the Eyes of God no long observe the world. This spell can only be cast if the Eyes of God enchantment is active.
